DOC.brief_summary: The objective study clinically evaluate safety effectiveness new multi-purpose disinfect solution soft contact lenses patient experience discomfort contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Investigational Multi-Purpose Disinfecting Solution Care Soft Contact Lenses Symptomatic Patients
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic contact lens relate discomfort end lens wear day . Successful daily wear FDA Group IV lenses twoweek longer replacement schedule least two week . Use multipurpose solution prestudy care regimen least one month ( rewetting drop use also acceptable ) . Successful lens wear least 4 hour per day . Vision correctable 20/30 . Normal eye current ocular abnormality prevent successful contact lens wear . No corneal surgery within past 12 month . No systemic disease affect eye could worsen use contact lens solution . No overthecounter prescription ocular medication . No enrollment another clinical study within 30 day prior enrollment .
